original_text: Thou shalt drink also water by measure, the sixth part of an hin: from time to time shalt thou drink.
korean_text: 물도 육분의 일 힌씩 되어서 때를 따라 마시라

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt drink also water by measure
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 정량으로 물을 마실 것이다

sentences.original_text: the sixth part of an hin
